posts.post_content: T3 Turkey Red cabinet of John McGraw-$800.00 delivered. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for additional information.  Please direct all correspondence to my email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my newly updated website below for a larger scan. Thank you for looking.
